phrases: Komachi's Present List
Book card Gift cards Large appliances.
Komachi's Present List!
A book card.
Gift cards.
Large appliances.
But what I want most of all is your happiness!
Wow!
I would give myself tons and tons of points for that one!
But what I want most of all is your happiness!
Wow!
I would give myself tons and tons of points for that one!
Also, we are out of detergent.
Buy some on your way home.
Also...
We are out of detergent.
Buy some on your way home.
Idiot...
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
Komachi, do not study under the kotatsu.
It will make you sleepy, and if you sleep under a kotatsu, you will catch a cold.
These things ruin people.
You know, it does not help when you
say that as you crawl under the kotatsu.
By the way, Komachi-chan.
What might this be?
Huh?
Just what it looks like.
I see...
Does she seriously want large appliances?
I know she is my own sister, but what the hell?
Thanks.
Oh, yeah.
Mom said to order chicken.
Chicken?
And cake.
Oh, that, huh?
I told her I would do that, but...
Same thing every year.
It is that parental instinct thing.
Do not worry about it.
Just work hard to get ready for entrance exams.
Eh, when you put it that way...
Sorry.
I could not think of another way to put it.
This is hard.
It might just piss her off to hear that
from someone who is not working hard.
Onii-chan, at times like that, you can just say I love you.
Really?
I love you, Komachi.
I do not feel the same, but thanks, Onii-chan!
Mean.
Hikki, are you coming to club today?
Yes, I know.
I will go.
Yeah, guess we should get going, huh?
I will go get my bag!
Why did you leave first again?
Like I told you, I am waiting.
So, um, I might leave early today.
Actually, I might be doing that every day for a while, maybe...
Helping Iroha-chan?
You knew?
It is plain as day just watching you.
Yukinoshita, too?
Hm, I do not know...
She does not talk about you.
Are you going to do this alone again?
I am only doing it because there is something I have to do.
You do not have to worry about it.
I will worry.
You have bigger things to worry about than me, do not you?
Yeah...
Do you think Yukinon wanted to be student council president?
I do not know.
You know, I think the whole club should have accepted that request.
I think that is what Yukinon would have done before all this.
What makes you think that?
Well...
I think trying to overcome stuff like that is what Yukinon likes to do.
So...
I thought it might be a good chance...
I see.
Yeah, before, it might have been.
But I wonder if that is true now.
Yeah...
Yahello!
Hello.
Hey.
Hey, can I ask something?
What is it?
Is it okay if I leave early every day for a while?
Well, it is not as if we are particularly busy.
Yeah, well, I mean...
I have got stuff going on.
Komachi's entrance exams, for one thing.
I see.
That might be better, though.
There is not much we can do for Komachi-chan.
You will just have to work harder to cover for us.
Right, Yukinon?
Yes, that is right.
Sorry about that.
Oh, yeah!
I should send Komachi-chan an email.
Chiba City Mihama Ward Takasu Community Center
Where is Isshiki?
Not here yet.
She is not with you?
Did you guys hear anything?
I did send her an email...
She might still be at her club.
Talk to each other!
Iroha said she had something to do and left early.
She is doing a lot of stuff for the student council, right?
You knew about that?
She will not say what she is doing,
but I can tell she is really busy.
You know, if you know that, you could help her.
It is not like she asked me to.
You are the one she counts on.
She is just using me because she can.
And you cannot refuse, huh?
That is what our club is for.
I do not have any reason to refuse.
And unlike you, I have time on my hands.
Is that all it is?
What are you saying?
You never refuse her either, do you?
And not because of the club you are in.
I do not know about that.
I am not the good guy you think I am.
Take care of Iroha.
Takasu Community Center Mihama Library
Isshiki?
Sorry.
Did I make you wait long?
I did not even wait.
I went looking for you.
Are not you supposed to say Not at all, I just got here myself?
It is not heavy today, so I am good.
Really?
Yep.
And we are late now, so let us get moving.
We will be focusing on all of your individual manpower.
Let us figure things out together.
Come right out and say whatever comes to mind.
We look forward to working with you!
He calls them here and then just leaves them?
Should we ask what we are supposed to do?
Who is going to ask?
I do not want to.
Let us have our teacher ask.
Yeah, good idea.
I will go.
What should we do?
The girl from Chiba Village in summer...
At their camp school,
I destroyed the relationships among Tsurumi Rumi's friends.
And I forced Hayama and his buddies to play bad guys.
Senpai?
Is something wrong?
No, nothing.
What should we do?
Do not ask me.
Oh, sorry.
What should we have the kids do?
Well...
Nothing's been decided yet...
Maybe it would be best to check with them.
Since we agreed to deal with them,
we have to think about it ourselves.
I guess you are right...
We should start with something
that will keep them out of the way, but is still important.
Like making decorations.
They could do that, right?
That is true.
We will do that, then.
That will work for the moment,
but if they do not decide what the actual event will be, this will not last.
If Isshiki has her reservations with Tamanawa, then...
Got a second?
What is up?
Well, if we do not decide what the event will be,
no amount of help will make a difference.
Then let us all think about it together.
No, you will never decide anything just saying vague stuff back and forth.
I think it would be best to narrow down what we will do, and deliberate on that...
But would not that restrict our outlook?
I think we should all search for a solution together.
But we are running out of time.
You are right.
We will all have to consider what to do about that, too.
I understand you feel rushed,
but let us all do our best to cover for each other.
Okay?
Fine.
But you should really start that meeting now.
Okay, then let us start the meeting.
Now that we have worked together on the ground design,
let us focus more on discussion of the creative end today.
That is very typical of Christmas, and of us, right?
A classical Christmas concert seems like a standard for local events.
Is not jazz more Christmasy?
Christmas Event -Orchestra -Band -Jazz concert -Choir -Dance -Play -Gospel -Musical -Dramatic reading
But I think we should take young minds into consideration.
Maybe a band?
In that case, we could get a choir, or even rent a pipe organ.
That is the ticket!
Okay, let us consider each one.
Christmas Event -Orchestra -Band -Jazz concert -Choir -Charades -Dance -Quiz Contest -Play -Bingo -Gospel -Gift Exchange -Musical -Dramatic reading -Christmas Cake
Would not it be faster to pick from among what we have got right now?
Instead of rejecting anything right away,
we need to take all suggestions into account
and come up with something everyone can agree on.
Yeah, but...
Some of these ideas are similar,
so it may be possible to combine them.
Why do not we put all the music ideas together into a multi-genre concert?
That is the ticket!
From the standpoint of putting ideas together,
music and musicals are highly compatible.
That will work!
Why do not we just do it all and make it a movie?
So, a musical movie?
All right, I will take the initiative on this.
That is the ticket!
Hachiman!
Hachiman, over here!
Hey!
The heat's turned up pretty high in here...
There.
Not right!
This is not right!
It is the heat that is making my face red, too!
That, or it is likely I am catching a cold or something.
Totsuka is a guy!
Calm down.
Calm down and compose a haiku.
Me, sick in the head?
I am not sick in the head.
I am sick in the head.
Me, sick in the head?
I am not sick in the head.
I am sick in the head.
(Sick)
I am definitely sick.
Just that fact that I am composing haiku is proof I am sick.
This is good!
You eat some pretty heavy stuff, huh?
I think that kind of food is best when you are tired.
You have seemed that way lately, so...
Have I?
Did something happen?
Nope.
Nothing happened.
Oh, yeah.
You do not say stuff like that, huh?
It is not that, really.
Isshiki asked me for help, so I am just busy with that.
And I am the one who pushed her to where she is...
Really?
Yeah.
So you do not have to worry.
Okay.
You really are cool, Hachiman.
I do not mean that in a weird way.
Like, even if it is tough or painful,
you work hard on your own, without complaining.
I think that is really cool.
That is not true.
I complain, and I say spiteful things all the time.
Yeah, maybe.
But if anything's bothering you, tell me, okay?
Cool, huh?
I am not cool at all.
I think I am just trying to play it cool.
I am just being stubborn so I will not betray the image
that I have decided I should have.
But seeing Yuigahama force herself to smile,
and the gloomy looks Isshiki gets sometimes,
and Tsurumi Rumi standing there by herself...
And most of all, the quiet smile of Yukinoshita's that says she is given up...
It makes me ask again and again...
Am I really doing the right thing?
Oh, Senpai...
Hey.
Buying snacks on the way again?
No, it looks like there is no meeting today.
Oh, really?
Too bad for you, huh?
You do not get to win points with me.
I do not need points that can be won that easily.
Hey, it is Isshiki-chan and Hikigaya.
Hello.
Heya!
That is right.
You know Senpai, do not you?
Yeah, we went to the same middle school.
I guess even you have some friends, huh?
I would not say we are friends...
It is, well... a thing.
What thing?
That is a suggestive way to put it.
Senpai, what thing?
A lot happened in the past.
Well, it was a long time ago.
What?
What happened?
Um...
No matter how I calculate it, we do not have the budget.
What should we do?
Either cut out some activities, or raise funds.
I guess all we can do is wait until the next meeting to decide.
Senpai, they are almost finished making the decorations.
What should they do next?
How about the tree?
We have already got the tree,
but would not it get in the way if we put it up now?
Negotiate with the center so they will let us put it by the entrance.
It is one week away, so that should be perfect.
We can just carry it to the venue on the day of the event.
That makes sense.
Okay, then!
Doing it this way is very bad.
I am actually giving directions.
This is clearly different from just offering support.
I should talk to him
so I can change where this is going and leave the rest to Isshiki.
There were a lot of ideas, so our side examined them.
Here is what is possible, and what is not possible.
Though, in terms of our budget, most of them are impossible.
Oh, thanks.
This clarifies where we have problems.
Now we will all think about how to solve
I do not think that will work.
We only have a week.
Right...
And there are several bands we could outsource.
Depending on how we structure it,
I think we can create an event in our own way.
So for starters, let us all consider this together.
If we do not make a decision at the next meeting, we cannot finish the work in time.
Keep that in mind.
Of course.
This is bad.
I am out of options.
She is making decorations?
Making those by yourself?
You can see that much, cannot you?
How long did you have to delay that?
What are you doing?
You can see that much, cannot you?
Do not you have anything else to do?
Nope, I do not.
Bum.
Lay off.
I am borrowing the cutter, okay?
Senpai, you are not into younger girls, are you?
I cannot say I have a problem with them.
I have got a little sister.
Were you just hitting on me?
I am sorry.
I like older guys, but I cannot.
No, that is obviously not what I was doing.
Why do you have to treat me like that?
So that is the last of them?
Yeah.
Okay, I am heading back.
YOU-Um, thank
The tree.
I think they are still working on it.
Why do not you go see?
Oh...
Okay.
I know I have saved some people with the way I used to do things.
But I am sure that alone is not enough.
My responsibility...
The answer I need...
I still do not know what it is.
Hey.
Good evening.
Were... you shopping?
Yes.
And what brings you out at this hour?
I just had... some stuff.
I see.
You are helping with Isshiki-san's request, are not you?
Oh...
Well, yeah, as it turned out...
You did not need to lie like that.
I was not exactly lying.
That was one of the reasons.
That is true.
It was not a lie.
Sorry I acted on my own.
I do not mind that.
It is not as if I can do anything where
your individual actions are concerned,
nor do I have the right to.
Or...
Do you need my permission?
No, I was just checking.
Really?
Then was there any need to apologize?
Besides, I am sure Isshiki-san feels more comfortable
working with you alone.
I believe you can solve this on your own.
You always have before.
I am not solving anything.
And I am only doing this alone because I am alone.
Same goes for you, does not it?
For me...
No.
Maybe I only thought I had it all together,
that I understood everything.
Listen, Yukinoshita...
Why do not you take a break from the club?
If you are only staying out of consideration for us, it is not necessary.
I am not showing consideration or anything.
You always have been.
Ever since back then.
So...
But you do not need to push yourself anymore.
If you were to break down, that would be all there was to it.
Am I wrong?
You do not have to force yourself to attend anymore.
Yet, That Room Continues
to Play Out the Endless Days.
08 But Still, Hikigaya Hachiman Is...
We should start verifying the agenda of our next meeting.
Agenda!
That is totally important!
We can share our schedules on the cloud, right?
Cloud!
That sounds totally strong!
We can upload our resumes, too.
Resume!
That sounds delicious!
We will give ourselves a buffer...
Buffer!
I totally want one of those!
Good.
I think everything's decided.
Okay, let us brainstorm and commit to results.
Commit to results!
That will work!
So, what should we talk about?
Huh?
Huh?
